short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you see how long you've been scrolling through YouTube shorts, and how many shorts you've scrolled through!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This item is exactly what it says it is - on YouTube shorts pages on desktop, a small counter of both how long, and how many shorts have been watched, is displayed. That's literally it. It will change per window of the page and will reset on a refresh, but not on a page change in the same tab - I want to make it log globally, because I feel that people doom scroll way too much on YouTube shorts, and I may expand it to further applications in due time. For the time being though, this app is what it says it is.
